code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles.css';import'../pfm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTransaction=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const[type,setType]=useState('income');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const newTransaction={description,amount:parseFloat(amount),type};await onAdd(newTransaction);setDescription('');setAmount('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"register-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add Transaction"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Description:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Amount:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Amount",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Type:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:type,onChange:e=>setType(e.target.value),required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"income",children:"Income"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"expense",children:"Expense"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-btn",children:"Add Transaction"})]})});};export default AddTransaction;
